Tiles.Text: Bigfoot looks preposterous, so it must leaves behind tracks.
There are some blurry photos of Bigfoot.
Blurry photos are hard to make out, so Bigfoot looks preposterous.
All photos of Bigfoot are blurry, so Bigfoot must be blurry.
Bigfoot isn't too ridiculous to exist and there is evidence, therefore, Bigfoot exists.
If sharks look preposterous but they exist, then Bigfoot isn't too ridiculous to exist.
If there are Bigfoot tracks, then there is evidence of Bigfoot.
I saw Bigfoot tracks one time.
